A person could use a clock app on their computer. Many computers come with a built-in clock or have a variety of clock apps available for download.
A person could use a clock app on their tablet. Similar to the computer, many tablets have built-in clocks or clock apps available for download.
A person could use a clock app on their smart TV. Many modern smart TVs have built-in clocks or clock apps available for download.
A person could use a clock app on their smart speaker. Many smart speakers, such as Amazon Echo or Google Home, have built-in clocks or clock apps available for download.
A person could use a clock app on their smart home device. Many smart home devices, such as smart lights or thermostats, have built-in clocks or clock apps available for download.
